SELECT /* DeviceProductProvisioningMapper.searchProductProvisioning, 단말Provisioning조회, 오승민/인크로스, 2014-02-04 */ P.PROD_ID AS PART_PROD_ID, P.PROD_GRD_CD, P.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD P, TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SD, TB_CM_DEVICE CD, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE TPP WHERE P.PROD_ID = SD.PROD_ID AND P.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND TP.PROD_ID = TPP.PROD_ID AND TP.TENANT_ID = TPP.TENANT_ID AND (SD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{req.deviceModelNo} OR SD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{virtualDeviceModelNo}) AND CD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{req.deviceModelNo} AND P.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD = #{contentTypeCd} AND CD.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD IN (#{prodStatusCd}, #{passProdStatusCd}) AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TPP.APPLY_START_DT AND TPP.APPLY_END_DT
AND P.PROD_ID IN
#{item}
AND (CASE WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{supportDevice.ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{supportDevice.comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN 0 WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN P.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{supportDevice.musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN NVL(P.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND #{supportDevice.videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN #{supportDevice.sdVideoSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 1 END) = 1
